scripts.deploy:hosted: source .subgraph-version && source .env && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --deploy-key $GRAPH_TOKEN olympusdao/token-holders
scripts.deploy:hosted:arbitrum: source .subgraph-version && source .env && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --deploy-key $GRAPH_TOKEN 0xjem/token-holders-arbitrum subgraph-arbitrum.yaml
scripts.deploy:ethereum: source .subgraph-version && source .env && graph deploy --studio --deploy-key $GRAPH_STUDIO_TOKEN --version-label $SUBGRAPH_VERSION token-holders subgraph.yaml
scripts.deploy:arbitrum: source .subgraph-version && source .env && graph deploy --studio --deploy-key $GRAPH_STUDIO_TOKEN --version-label $SUBGRAPH_VERSION token-holders-arbitrum subgraph-arbitrum.yaml
